reviewText: ya, will not play on the DVD player...I bought season 1 and after adding that to my shopping cart, I got an option to add seasons 3 and 4 so I said what the heck and added them...didn't think I'd have to click on check each one of those additional seasons to see if they were playable on a USA DVD.  That's too bad
I only didn't like it because we tried everything to get the dvd to play and no luck, so money down the drain unfortunately.
